Parameter.name: watershed_target_name
Parameter.description: Name of the watershed for which we wish to predict the seasonal streamflow.

Parameter.name: watersheds
Parameter.description: Name of the regional database file encompassing hydrological, climatic, and geological data from various watersheds.

Parameter.name: indicator
Parameter.description: Indicator's name used for calculating the similarity between two time series events

Parameter.name: variable
Parameter.description: Name of the variable for which we aim to compute the similarity.

Parameter.name: similarity_period
Parameter.description: Similarity period calculation between two timeseries.

Parameter.name: ndays_before_forecast
Parameter.description: Number of days before the forescast day (or current date).

Parameter.name: time_step
Parameter.description: Variable time step (can be daily 'D', weekly 'W' or monthly 'M').
